title: Add uploaded photos to Draft Version 2

requirements.text: Add the two user-uploaded images (Photo_1770974079038.png and IMG_20260204_215933_110.jpg) to the frontend as static assets and render them on the Draft Version 2 homepage in a new, clearly labeled section.
acceptanceCriteria: Both uploaded files are included in the repo under a public static path (e.g., frontend/public/assets/...) and can be loaded directly by the browser.
A new homepage section (e.g., "Photos" or "Gallery") displays both images in a responsive layout (1 column on mobile, 2 columns on tablet/desktop).
Each image includes English alt text appropriate to the photo content.
Images are styled to match the existing site theme (spacing, borders/radius, shadows) and do not break the existing layout.

requirements.text: Add navigation access to the new photos section from the header navigation using the existing smooth-scroll behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Header navigation includes a new link label in English (e.g., "Photos") that scrolls smoothly to the new photos section.
Mobile menu includes the same new navigation item and closes after selection, consistent with existing behavior.
All pre-existing navigation links (Home, Services, Service Area, Contact) still work as before.

constraints: Use English for all user-facing text.
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the existing single-page layout and contact phone number (+917842969695) behavior intact.
nonGoals: Do not add an online booking form.
Do not add or change backend (Motoko) logic.
Do not introduce third-party image hosting or external storage.
